meanings.definition: The wood of the basswood tree, used for carving and making furniture.
meanings.sent1: I carved a small figurine out of basswoods.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter crafted a beautiful table from basswoods.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to build a house out of basswoods.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate touch turned the basswoods into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly cut basswoods filled the workshop.

meanings.definition: A type of tree in the genus Tilia, known for its soft wood and large leaves.
meanings.sent1: The basswoods in the park provide ample shade.
meanings.sent2: Many birds nest in the branches of basswoods.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the basswoods were giant umbrellas.
meanings.sent4: The forest of basswoods whispered secrets in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The rustling of the basswoods was a lullaby to the weary traveler.
